ayi kiwe sudara ayiyala oya kanda nagiddi biththarayak wath aran giye na kiyala.ithin ban man kiwe ee minissu aran giye na kaweth na kaleta giyeth palathuru wattiyak ehema thiyala mita awurudu ganakata kalin kiyala.ithin eeka thamayi man kiwe ee kitaya.ow ithin api katha une na ne api ehema karanawa kiyala.api hithuwe ehema karanawa kiyala dan monawa karannada biththara newe ne biththara aappa ne api biththara noka biththara aappa kawemu.patakaya oba dannawada api me nokiya yanne koheda kiya ow oba dannawa ne mokada man udinma lokuwata liyala thiyanawa ne mathrukawak kiyala ekak.theka bila bas ekata naggata ahapu hirawela yanna hithak thibbe nathi nisa issaraha dora gawa inna anthimeta nagga kohoma hari hirawela yanne nathiwa nidahase hulan tikak wadigena drayiwar ekkayi kandektar ekkayi kayikak dagena yanna chans ekak labuna.tika welawak yaddi ahapun nidimatha uda panagena pahara denna patan gaththa.monawa karannada himita path wela dora gawa padiye idagena nindath nonindath athara iddi eka parata "nayit mel eka pili panala"nidimatha nima wiya.nagita drayiwar samanga katha kota ee gana wadi dura wadi dura thorathuru samanga deta bes eka apdet kara gathemi.wasanawakata kisidu jiwithayakata anathurak wi natha.me wana wita apa wirayanwa wi siti api nayit mel eke aawanam me wana wita gamana athara manga nawathi thibennata puluwani.eeth hirawi hitagena nidagena paminima dan apage wasiyatada wasanawatada harawi thibuni.dan apa wirayan wi siti.bahinnata hithagena aa tawumada apage gamananthayada drayiwarta pawasumi.ohuta anuwa basiya yuththe apage aramuna wu tawumata pasuwa handiyeni ohuta anuwa eewita apita ena wahanayak allagatha haki athara ee ekka nagi gamananthayata langawimata hakiwanu atha.apage aramuna wu tawumen bassoth apage gamananthaya udasana basaya paminena thek pramada kirimata siduwanu atha.ee nisawen karannata deyak natha apa drayiwarge upades anugamanaya karanna thiranayakata paminiyemu.apage kathawa kana wakunu bas rathaye kihipa denakuma ekwi upades dennata patann gathha, meya amaruma awasthawak baw boho awasthawala athdakim atha emenma me gamanedi meya itha karadarakari deyak wanu nowanu mana mak nisada yana.boho atharaman wim gananawakata pasu apa danna parasaya thula me kanda nagimata yana palamu kandama apa wimayi.samatama oluwa wana.adala handiyen basagathemu.

api dan siyalage gedara yanna oona ne sellam karanna giyoth wela madi weyi onna " " oya ayi kamisayak adala naththe " " kamise heduwa thama welila na " " ithin wena ekak adinnako " " mata wenin kamisa na ekayi thiyenne " podiththa ayagath dasin mawa desa balayi " ayi amme eyata wena kamisa naththe " podiththage prashna hamuwe hembath wi siti podiththage mawa waha podiththage kathawa wenathakata harawayi " api awuruddata siyala balanna game giyama oyata puluwan oona tharam sellam karanna " podiththage muhuna hadisiye amuthu aalokayakin pire waha aluth mithura desata harunu podiththa handa awadi karayi " oya yan nadda siyalage gedara apinam yanawa thaththata godak niwadu hamba una ne api ehe gihin gageth nanawa " uda bima balamin riyehi asiri widimin siti amuththa aduru muhunen yuthuwa podiththata pilithuru badi "ape gama ithin mehene.
